 2010-02592010-03-11,  ,  DFAIT,  ,  , 
ActChemical Weapons Convention Implementation Act
SubjectDeclarations Regulations (Chemical Weapons Convention)
PrecisDECLARATIONS REGULATIONS (CHEMICAL WEAPONS CONVENTION), in order to prescribe the type of information that needs to be provided to the Canadian National Authority, the time and form of submission as well as the documents that have to be retained and the manner and period of time for their retention.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0056 Publication Date: 2010-03-31
